original: 'di la 'brel pa can gyi rtags ni 'ga' yang mthong ba med do //
analyzed: 'di la 'brel pa can gyi rtags ni 'ga' yang mthong ba med do //
translated: No one has ever seen a reason that is related to time.

original: gzugs spyod pa dang 'du bas mngon sum ma yin pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs spyod pa dang 'du bas mngon sum ma yin pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Time is not imperceptible because it is a substance that is in contact with form.

original: rtags las ma skyes pa dang gnod pa med pas mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags las ma skyes pa dang gnod pa med pas mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a valid form of knowledge by perception because it is not produced by a reason and because it is not contradicted.

original: de'i phyir dus ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore time is something that is perceived only by the valid cognition of direct perception.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni yang na bral ba la sogs pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni yang na bral ba la sogs pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas so //
translated: It is not something that is inferred, because it is not tenable that separation and so on are different.

original: de la re zhig yun ring ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i blo mngon sum yin pa sel ba ni dus ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig yun ring ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i blo mngon sum yin pa sel ba ni dus ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In this regard, the refutation of the idea that the cognitions of long and so on are direct perception is stated in the lines ‚ÄúTime is not an object of direct perception‚Äù and so on.

original: mdun na gnas pa'i dus gang la yod pa zhes spyir bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa'i dus gang la yod pa zhes spyir bsdu ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the time that is present‚Äù is a general reference.

original: gal te dus mdun na gnas pa ma yin yang mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: gal te dus mdun na gnas pa ma yin yang mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that time is not present but still becomes an object of direct perception,

original: de lta rnam pa dang zhes gsungs te mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa dang bral na'o //
analyzed: de lta rnam pa dang zhes gsungs te mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa dang bral na'o //
translated: then the root text states, ‚ÄúIf it is devoid of the aspect of the present,‚Äù that is, if it is devoid of the aspect of the present that is present in front of one.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nyid yun ring ba la sogs pa'i don yin par brjod pa na /üîΩrgyu rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nyid yun ring ba la sogs pa'i don yin par brjod pa na /üîΩrgyu rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When the Proponent of the Doctrines of Mind Only states that the nature of the effect is the meaning of long and so on,üîΩthe Proponent of Real Images responds with the lines ‚ÄúIf the nature of the effect is the meaning of long and so on.‚Äù

original: dus med kyang dal ba nas rim gyis yongs su rdzogs pa ni yun ring ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: dus med kyang dal ba nas rim gyis yongs su rdzogs pa ni yun ring ba'i don yin no //
translated: and even though there is no time, the gradual completion of the slow one is the meaning of long.

original: gal te dus med na dal bu de nyid ji ltar snyam na /
analyzed: gal te dus med na dal bu de nyid ji ltar snyam na /
translated: If there is no time, how can that slow one be?

original: rgyu rnams nye bar mi gnas phyir //
analyzed: rgyu rnams nye bar mi gnas phyir //
translated: Because the causes do not remain near.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: des na dal bu la sogs pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas /
analyzed: des na dal bu la sogs pa gzhan du mi 'thad pas /
translated: Therefore, since slowness, etc. are not tenable in any other way,üîΩtime is not to be inferred.

original: dus dpag par bya ba ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dus dpag par bya ba ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Such is the thought.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúsuch as a pot‚Äù will be explained.üîΩBecause that is tenable,

original: de 'thad ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dal bu la sogs pa 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'thad ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dal bu la sogs pa 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because slowness, etc. are tenable.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because the non-tenability in any other way is lost.üîΩAgain, others suspect that time is to be inferred because it is not tenable in any other way.

original: yang gzhan dag gzhan du mi 'thad pas @162b dus rjes su dpag par bya zhes bya bar dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba nas 'jug na zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: yang gzhan dag gzhan du mi 'thad pas @162b dus rjes su dpag par bya zhes bya bar dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba nas 'jug na zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù up to ‚Äúif it enters‚Äù is the question.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni lan te 'bras bu la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni lan te 'bras bu la'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù is the answer, in regard to the effect.

original: rgyu med par zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu med par zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout a cause‚Äù is a hypothetical objection.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúWell then‚Äù is the response.

original: 'o na ji ltar dus nus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar dus nus pa yin zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúHow is time capable?‚Äù

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the response.

original: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù is the response.

original: dus rgyu'i dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dus rgyu'i dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTime is the state of being a cause‚Äù and so on.

original: 'o na gang las rgyur 'gyur ba dus kyi med pa ni yod pa kho na 'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na gang las rgyur 'gyur ba dus kyi med pa ni yod pa kho na 'o snyam na /
translated: ‚ÄúWell then, if time does not exist, what is the cause?‚Äù

original: dus ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dus ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúTime‚Äù is the response.

original: dus ni mi rtag pa dang ma khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: dus ni mi rtag pa dang ma khyab pa yin te /
translated: Time is impermanent and does not pervade.üîΩ‚ÄúIt is also manifested by the power of conditions‚Äù is the response.

original: rkyen gyi stobs kyis mngon par gsal ba yang yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs par byed pa ni 'o na te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rkyen gyi stobs kyis mngon par gsal ba yang yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs par byed pa ni 'o na te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWell then‚Äù is the response.

original: dus gzhan zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: dus gzhan zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom another time‚Äù is the response.

original: rgyu gzhan las so zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi lan no //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan las so zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom another cause‚Äù is the response.

original: gang las dus kyi rim pa grub pa de nyid las 'bras bu'i rim par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gang las dus kyi rim pa grub pa de nyid las 'bras bu'i rim par 'gyur mod /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that very establishment of the sequence of time, the sequence of effects would occur.

original: rim pa gzhan la rag las pa'i dus las ni ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: rim pa gzhan la rag las pa'i dus las ni ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: not from time that is dependent on another stage.

original: 'o na de nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na de nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But in that case, the same text says:

original: rang la gnas pa'i rim pa med pa'i phyir na 'di rang nyid rim pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang la gnas pa'i rim pa med pa'i phyir na 'di rang nyid rim pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since there is no stage that exists in itself, it is not itself endowed with a stage.

original: dogs pa bsu pa ni rim pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu pa ni rim pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The objection is anticipated:

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not the nature of the effect,

original: rim pa yang dus yin no zhes gzhan mngon par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa yang dus yin no zhes gzhan mngon par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since time is also a stage, as others believe.

original: lan du ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is: No, because

original: de yang zhes bya ba'i lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'am rim pa'o /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba'i lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'am rim pa'o /
translated: that is either simultaneous or not simultaneous or successive.

original: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs khyad par can gyi rang bzhin las tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs khyad par can gyi rang bzhin las tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Different from its own nature means different from the nature of a special state.

original: da ni ji ltar dus gsum par gnas snyam du dogs pa bsu nas /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar dus gsum par gnas snyam du dogs pa bsu nas /
translated: Now, how can it abide in the three times? Anticipating this doubt,üîΩthe text says:

original: dus gsum rnam par gnas pa brjod pa ni mthong gyur 'das pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus gsum rnam par gnas pa brjod pa ni mthong gyur 'das pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the three times is ‚Äúthat which has been seen in the past. ‚Äù

original: gal te dus med na mthong bar  gyur la sogs pa nyid ji ltar zhe na ma yin te//
analyzed: gal te dus med na mthong bar  gyur la sogs pa nyid ji ltar zhe na ma yin te//
translated: If there is no time, how can there be that which has been seen and so on?

original: gang gi tshe dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yin la /
translated: That which is suitable to be perceived but is not perceived is the past.

original: thams cad kyis sdar ma dmigs pa byis 'gas dmigs par 'gyur ba ni ma 'ongs pa yin la /
analyzed: thams cad kyis sdar ma dmigs pa byis 'gas dmigs par 'gyur ba ni ma 'ongs pa yin la /
translated: That which is not perceived by all, but is perceived by some, is the future.

original: dmigs bzhin pa ni da ltar ba yin no //üîΩde @163a * //
analyzed: dmigs bzhin pa ni da ltar ba yin no // de @163a * //
translated: That which is being perceived is the present.

original: ltar mthong zin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltar mthong zin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the classification of that which has been seen and so on is illustrated by the fact that it is to be individually realized.

original: gzhan du na ni dus smra ba yang gsal par byed pa'i dbye ba ma rtogs par 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus rnam par gnas par ji ltar brjod /
analyzed: gzhan du na ni dus smra ba yang gsal par byed pa'i dbye ba ma rtogs par 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus rnam par gnas par ji ltar brjod /
translated: Otherwise, even the proponent of time would not understand the illustration of the classification of the three times, and how could he state the existence of the three times, the past and so on?

original: dus ni don las tha dad par rang gi ngo bos snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dus ni don las tha dad par rang gi ngo bos snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Time does not appear to exist inherently as something different from objects.

original: gal te mi snang na 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te mi snang na 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it does not appear, then how?

original: lan du 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is: this is...

original: don gyi bde bar gnas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid khyad par gzhan spong ba'i sgo nas 'di'i dus zhes bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: don gyi bde bar gnas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid khyad par gzhan spong ba'i sgo nas 'di'i dus zhes bstan pa yin te /
translated: The nature of the reality of the good abode, etc. is taught as time by the exclusion of other distinctions.

original: de ni de kho na ltar tshad mas 'thad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni de kho na ltar tshad mas 'thad pa'i phyir te /
translated: That is established by valid cognition just as it is;

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: not otherwise.üîΩThis meaning is not in conflict with the world.

original: don 'di yang 'jig rten dang 'gal ba med pa kho na'o zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin nyid du yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don 'di yang 'jig rten dang 'gal ba med pa kho na'o zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin nyid du yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement is: just as...

original: khyod kyi dus ni ji ltar gyur te bzang po'am ngan par gyur pa zhig yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi dus ni ji ltar gyur te bzang po'am ngan par gyur pa zhig yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Your time is just as it is, whether good or bad.

original: gal te de ltar 'dir yang ji ltar don gyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid la dus zhes ji ltar tha snyad byed pa snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'dir yang ji ltar don gyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid la dus zhes ji ltar tha snyad byed pa snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that here also, just as the distinction of the state of the object is time, how is it conventionally designated?

original: 'di'i don brjod pa ni khyod ci bde bar gnas sam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i don brjod pa ni khyod ci bde bar gnas sam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression of this meaning is: are you well?

original: ci zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di nyid yin no zhes smras pa ni de'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di nyid yin no zhes smras pa ni de'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúwhat‚Äù is just this, he says.

original: bde bar gnas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dri bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: bde bar gnas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dri bar bya ba yin na /
translated: The distinction of the nature of ‚Äúdwelling happily,‚Äù etc., is to be asked about.

original: khyod kyi skyes pa'i dus gang yin //
analyzed: khyod kyi skyes pa'i dus gang yin //
translated: What is the time of your birth?

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di rigs pa yin no //
translated: This is the proper question.

original: gzhan gyis kun brtags pa'i dus ni 'jig rten gyi 'dri ba'i tshig gi yul ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis kun brtags pa'i dus ni 'jig rten gyi 'dri ba'i tshig gi yul ma yin te /
translated: The time imagined by others is not the domain of worldly questions,

original: de ni rang bzhin gcig nyid kyis log pa dang gzhan pa la sogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin gcig nyid kyis log pa dang gzhan pa la sogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for it to be the same or different, etc., by its very nature.

original: yang gang gi tshe la sogs par khyod kyi dus ji ltar 'gyur zhes dri ba de'i tshe'ang bde bar gnas pa'am mi bde bar gnas pa'i grong la sogs pa nyid 'jig rten gyi dri ba'i yul yin gyi dus tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe la sogs par khyod kyi dus ji ltar 'gyur zhes dri ba de'i tshe'ang bde bar gnas pa'am mi bde bar gnas pa'i grong la sogs pa nyid 'jig rten gyi dri ba'i yul yin gyi dus tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, when you ask, ‚ÄúHow is your time in the spring, etc.?,‚Äù the domain of worldly questions is just the village, etc., where you dwell happily or unhappily, not a different time.

original: des na dus tha dad pa nyid ma yin par ni 'jig rten yang 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na dus tha dad pa nyid ma yin par ni 'jig rten yang 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the world does not accept that time is not different.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dus zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs des na de ltar mi mthong ba ni sngar dmigs pa dang phyis dmigs par 'gyur pa ni go rims @163b bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dus zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs des na de ltar mi mthong ba ni sngar dmigs pa dang phyis dmigs par 'gyur pa ni go rims @163b bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni
translated: Since time does not exist for the reasons stated, it is not seen in this way: that which is observed previously and that which is observed later are the past and future, respectively.üîΩThis is the reality of the matter.

original: don gyi de kho na'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rtsod pa bslang ba'i don du mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: don gyi de kho na'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rtsod pa bslang ba'i don du mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: The opponent raises an objection:üîΩIf that is so, then,

original: de nyid smras pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //üîΩde las zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnas par gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: de nyid smras pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o // de las zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnas par gyur pa la'o //
translated: in that case,üîΩthe opponent concludes the discussion by asking a question:

original: rtsod par smra ba nyid mjug sdud pa'i sgo nas 'dri ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsod par smra ba nyid mjug sdud pa'i sgo nas 'dri ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore,

original: gang gi phyir rang gis mi mthong ba mthong ba yin no zhes brjod pa na 'gal ba yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gis mi mthong ba mthong ba yin no zhes brjod pa na 'gal ba yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: since it is contradictory to say that one does not see what one sees, for that reason

original: 'di la lan ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan ni gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply to this is ‚Äúby another.‚Äù

original: so so'i skye bos so //
analyzed: so so'i skye bos so //
translated: By an ordinary person.

original: de mthong ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas mthong pa nyid kyis so//
analyzed: de mthong ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas mthong pa nyid kyis so//
translated: ‚ÄúBy seeing it‚Äù means by the yogin seeing it.

original: de la ltos te de rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ltos te de rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In relation to that, it does not exist as a distinct entity.

original: da ltar ba'i tha snyad ni mthong bzhin pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: da ltar ba'i tha snyad ni mthong bzhin pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the convention of present is a reason for mere seeing.

original: de tsam du ni zhes bya ba mthong bzhin tsam gyis da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam du ni zhes bya ba mthong bzhin tsam gyis da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pas ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúTo that extent‚Äù means that it is not related to the present time by mere seeing.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi mthong ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means it is not seen by another.

original: skyon med do zhes bya ba ni ma yang yin la mo gsham yang yin no zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: skyon med do zhes bya ba ni ma yang yin la mo gsham yang yin no zhes bya bar brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no fault‚Äù means that it is a mother and also a barren woman.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa la thams cad mthong bzhin pa kho na yin pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pas na de rig par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa la thams cad mthong bzhin pa kho na yin pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pas na de rig par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: Thus, since everything is seen by the yogin, the past and so on do not exist as distinct entities. Therefore, how can they be known?

original: gzhan la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says ‚Äúto another.‚Äù

original: 'o skol la ltos nas rnal 'byor ba'i 'das pa la sogs pa rnam par dbye ba yin gyi rang nyid la ltos pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'o skol la ltos nas rnal 'byor ba'i 'das pa la sogs pa rnam par dbye ba yin gyi rang nyid la ltos pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the distinction of past, etc. is in relation to another, not in relation to itself.

original: de ltar dus tha dad pa med pa'i phyir na da ltar byung ba'i dus dang 'brel bas ni yod pa nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar dus tha dad pa med pa'i phyir na da ltar byung ba'i dus dang 'brel bas ni yod pa nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: Since there is no separate time, it is not that the present time exists in connection with it,

original: 'on kyang mngon du byas pa nyid do zhes mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang mngon du byas pa nyid do zhes mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas ston pa ni /
translated: but rather it is manifested. This is the summary indication.

original: de'i phyir mngon du byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon du byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúmanifested.‚Äù

original: dbang po'i byed pa med pa ma yin te 'on kyang dbang po'i byed pa yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i byed pa med pa ma yin te 'on kyang dbang po'i byed pa yod pa kho na'o //
translated: It is not that there is no activity of the sense faculty, but rather there is only the activity of the sense faculty.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa la dbang po'i byed pa ji ltar srid snyam pa las mngon du byas pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa la dbang po'i byed pa ji ltar srid snyam pa las mngon du byas pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: How is it possible that the activity of the sense faculty exists in relation to the past, etc.? Therefore, he says ‚Äúmanifested.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the activity of the sense faculty.

original: gzhan du na dbang po'i byed pa las mngon du byed ba khas blangs par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs ba'o //üîΩde ltar dus med pa'i phyir kho bo cag la ltos nas rnal 'byor pa'i @164a * //
analyzed: gzhan du na dbang po'i byed pa las mngon du byed ba khas blangs par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs ba'o // de ltar dus med pa'i phyir kho bo cag la ltos nas rnal 'byor pa'i @164a * //
translated: Otherwise, one would not accept that it is manifested from the activity of the sense faculty.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye'i rang nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye'i rang nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, because time does not exist, the past, etc., are distinguished in relation to us, but not in themselves.

original: da ni dus khas blangs nas 'das pa la sogs pa de'i dus kyis da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel ba dang / 'das pa la sogs par yang mi 'gal lo zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni dus khas blangs nas 'das pa la sogs pa de'i dus kyis da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel ba dang / 'das pa la sogs par yang mi 'gal lo zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, having accepted time, it is said that there is no contradiction in the past, etc., being related to the present time by that time, and also in the past, etc., not being related to the present time.üîΩMoreover, means again.

original: de zhes bya ba ni'am la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni'am la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: That means or, etc., is the meaning.

original: de'i tshe de'i dus dang 'brel ba gang gi tshe mngon du byas pa de'i tshe da ltar bar med kyang yod pa nyid 'thad dka' bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i dus dang 'brel ba gang gi tshe mngon du byas pa de'i tshe da ltar bar med kyang yod pa nyid 'thad dka' bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: When it is manifested at that time, at that time, even though the present does not exist, existence is still tenable.

original: de'i tshe da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel bar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel bar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at that time, it is grasped as related to the present time.

original: gal te da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir na ji ltar yod pa nyid yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir na ji ltar yod pa nyid yin snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúHow can it exist, since it is not related to the present time?

original: gal te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIf . . .‚ÄùüîΩüîΩ

original: des na rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum nyid du yang mi 'gal lo zhes mjug sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum nyid du yang mi 'gal lo zhes mjug sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the yogi‚Äôs consciousness is not contradictory as direct perception.

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the summary.

original: gzhan gyi'o // gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i shes mngon sum gyis 'das pa la sogs pa'i don gyi yul can yin na de'i des yongs su bcad pa'i don 'das pa la sogs pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi'o // gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i shes mngon sum gyis 'das pa la sogs pa'i don gyi yul can yin na de'i des yongs su bcad pa'i don 'das pa la sogs pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the yogi‚Äôs consciousness of the past, etc. is direct perception, and if it has the object of past, etc. objects, how can it be ascertained that the object is past, etc.?

original: lta ba po'i zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: lta ba po'i zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúThe yogi‚Äôs consciousness of the past, etc.‚Äù

original: rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe'i da ltar ba nyid kyi dus dang 'brel par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe'i da ltar ba nyid kyi dus dang 'brel par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the yogi at that time apprehends it as related to the present time.

original: gzhan gyis ni ste so so'i skye pos ni de'i tshe'i da ltar ba'i dus dang rang 'brel par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ste so so'i skye pos ni de'i tshe'i da ltar ba'i dus dang rang 'brel par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Others, i.e., ordinary beings, do not apprehend it as related to the present time.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang 'das pa la sogs pa nyid du gnas par gzhag pa la legs par gnas pa yin no zhes ston pa ni rnal 'byor bas kyang zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /

analyzed: ma 'ongs pa nyid du zhes bya ba 'di yang ngo //

translated: The yogi sees the past, etc.üîΩThe yogi sees

original: 'on te de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'i dus na rtogs bzhin pa 'das pa la sogs pa'i don ji ltar gzhan te /
analyzed: 'on te de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'i dus na rtogs bzhin pa 'das pa la sogs pa'i don ji ltar gzhan te /
translated: Or, ‚Äúat that time‚Äù refers to the time of the agent. How can the object, such as the past, etc., be different from the time of the agent?

original: byed pa po'i dus las gzhan pa'i dus gang yin pa de ni de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po'i dus las gzhan pa'i dus gang yin pa de ni de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Any time that is different from the time of the agent is called ‚Äúanother time.‚Äù

original: lan du gzhan gyi dus nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du gzhan gyi dus nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: because it is understood as another time.

original: 'di nyid smras pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid smras pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said: ‚Äúin this way.‚Äù

analyzed: skyes bu gang la de'i tshe zhes bya ba de'i dus dang 'brel bar ram /
translated: The person at that time, i.e., at that time when he is related to that time,üîΩor at another time, i.e., at another time when he is related to another time,

original: gzhan gyi tshe gzhan gyi dus dang 'brel bar ngo bo gang zhig rig pa'i sngos po de ni skyes bu de'i ngo bo nyid du /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe gzhan gyi dus dang 'brel bar ngo bo gang zhig rig pa'i sngos po de ni skyes bu de'i ngo bo nyid du /
translated: whatever his nature is, that is his nature at that time,

original: de'i dus dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i dus dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi /
translated: i.e., it is his nature when he is related to that time.

original: byed pa po'i dus nyid ni don de'i ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po'i dus nyid ni don de'i ma yin no //
translated: But the time of the agent is not the time of that object.

original: dus ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: dus ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTime‚Äù is explained below.

original: don gyi zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: don gyi zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúObject‚Äù refers to the past, etc.

original: ci'i phyir byed pa po'i dus don gyi ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byed pa po'i dus don gyi ma yin snyam na /
translated: Why is it not the time of the agent?

original: dus gzhan gyi zhes smos so //
analyzed: dus gzhan gyi zhes smos so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúof another time.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya ste byed pa po'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya ste byed pa po'o //
translated: The object of knowledge is the object of knowledge such as the past, etc., which is the agent.

original: dus gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni las so //
analyzed: dus gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni las so //
translated: ‚ÄúOf another time‚Äù is the object.

original: gal te byed pa po'i dus nyid las 'das pa la sogs pa'i don mthong pa'i phyir ji ltar gnyis kyi dus tha dad pa nyid ci'i phyir snyam na /
analyzed: gal te byed pa po'i dus nyid las 'das pa la sogs pa'i don mthong pa'i phyir ji ltar gnyis kyi dus tha dad pa nyid ci'i phyir snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that the time of the agent is the time of the object of knowledge such as the past, etc., why is the time of the two different?

original: byed pa po na gsungs so //
analyzed: byed pa po na gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúof the object of knowledge.‚Äù

original: rtogs par bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus so //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus so //
translated: The object of knowledge is the time such as the past, etc.

original: de zhes bya ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the object of knowledge such as the past, etc.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba byed pa po'i dus su'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba byed pa po'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù refers to the time of the agent.

original: de ltar gzhal bya ni dus gzhan dang 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar gzhal bya ni dus gzhan dang 'brel pa yin la /
translated: Thus the object of knowledge is related to another time.

original: lta ba po ni da ltar ba dus dang 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: lta ba po ni da ltar ba dus dang 'brel pa yin te /
translated: The seer is related to the present time,

original: rang gi rgu'i gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgu'i gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: because he is dependent on his own time.

original: da ni lta ba po dang blta bya gnyi ga da ltar ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: da ni lta ba po dang blta bya gnyi ga da ltar ba kho na yin te /
translated: Now, the seer and the seen are only present.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are seen in the state of meditative concentration.üîΩLater, they are different in time because they are different in the present.

original: dus phyis da lta ba dang gzhan nyid kyis dus tha dad pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pas gzhag pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus phyis da lta ba dang gzhan nyid kyis dus tha dad pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pas gzhag pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that they are established by conceptual thought is ‚ÄúMoreover, . . .

original: byed pa po yang zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgra ni gzhal bya sdud pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po yang zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgra ni gzhal bya sdud pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in ‚Äúthe agent also . . . ‚Äù includes the object of comprehension.

original: de'i dus nyid du ni rtogs pa'i dus nyid du'o //
analyzed: de'i dus nyid du ni rtogs pa'i dus nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù is at the time of understanding.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni langs pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni langs pa'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLater‚Äù is at the time of arising.

original: dus gzhan nyid du zhes bya ba ni lta ba po da ltar byung ba nyid dang / blta bar bya ba 'das pa nyid @165a * //
analyzed: dus gzhan nyid du zhes bya ba ni lta ba po da ltar byung ba nyid dang / blta bar bya ba 'das pa nyid @165a * //
translated: ‚ÄúDifferent in time‚Äù is when the seer is present and the seen is past.

original: du'o ; / ji ltar byed pa po'i dus gzhan yin snyam du dogs na dus gzhan nyid sngar brjod pa dran par brjod pa ni /üîΩgzhan nyid du zhes bya ba de /
analyzed: du'o ; / ji ltar byed pa po'i dus gzhan yin snyam du dogs na dus gzhan nyid sngar brjod pa dran par brjod pa ni / gzhan nyid du zhes bya ba de /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúHow can the agent be different in time?‚Äù the statement that recalls the previously stated difference in time is ‚ÄúThe difference . . .üîΩ‚Äù

original: gzhal bya'i dus las so //
analyzed: gzhal bya'i dus las so //
translated: The object of comprehension is different from the time of the agent.

original: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni la ltar ba'i dus nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni la ltar ba'i dus nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAlready explained‚Äù refers to such passages as ‚ÄúThe time of the past is just the time of the present.‚Äù

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: The summary of the section is:

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzhal bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means that the object of comprehension is the past, etc.

original: de'i dus nyid ni de'i tshe 'di ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de'i dus nyid ni de'i tshe 'di ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pa nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe time of that‚Äù means the time of the present, which is connected with that.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe 'di ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe 'di ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel ba nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means that the time of the present is connected with that.

original: gal te rnal 'byor pa'i tha snyad ni bdag gi 'das pa la sogs pa de ltar rtogs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rnal 'byor pa'i tha snyad ni bdag gi 'das pa la sogs pa de ltar rtogs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that the yogi‚Äôs convention is that the past, etc. are realized in that way?

original: de ji ltar ba'i dus nyid ji ltar gzhal bya ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: de ji ltar ba'i dus nyid ji ltar gzhal bya ma yin snyam na /
translated: How can the time of the present not be an object of comprehension?

original: de ngas deng zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ngas deng zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúI now . . .‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya'i dus nyid la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya'i dus nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the time of the object of comprehension.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa tsam gyi yul can yin pas mngon sum 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa tsam gyi yul can yin pas mngon sum 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since it is a subject that has a non-hidden object, it is not a case of the engagement of direct perception. This is the meaning.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni pha la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni pha la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another‚Äù means by a father, etc.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni //
translated: This is clarified:

original: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn regard to whom‚Äù and so on.

original: lha sbyin gang la'o //üîΩdes myong ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni lha sbyin gyis nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: lha sbyin gang la'o // des myong ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni lha sbyin gyis nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid du'o //
translated: In regard to Devadatta.

original: de la zhes bya ni lha sbyin gyis so /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ni lha sbyin gyis so /
translated: ‚ÄúBy him‚Äù means by Devadatta.

original: rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa ci ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa ci ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
translated: How can the cognition of the yogi be nonerroneous?

original: ji ste 'khrul pa yin snyam na //
analyzed: ji ste 'khrul pa yin snyam na //
translated: If you think it is erroneous,

original: rnal 'byor pas ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe yogi.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir nges nyams su myong pa nyid du zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba ci'i bu da ltar rnal 'byor pas yin gyi bu dang ldan pas ni ma yin pa de'i phyir 'khrul pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges nyams su myong pa nyid du zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba ci'i bu da ltar rnal 'byor pas yin gyi bu dang ldan pas ni ma yin pa de'i phyir 'khrul pa kho na'o //
translated: Since it is said, ‚Äúby him who has the experience,‚Äù why is it that the yogi has it, and not the one who has the son? Therefore it is just erroneous.

original: bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid yin na ni de dang 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'byung ba rang gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid yin na ni de dang 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'byung ba rang gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: If the son were to arise, then the characteristic of his connection would arise by itself.

original: des na bu dang ldan pa'i mi rung ba mi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa byed ma yin no //
analyzed: des na bu dang ldan pa'i mi rung ba mi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'i sgrub pa byed ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the non-observation of the non-existence of a son in a man is not a proof of non-existence.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni rjes su dpog pa dang / rtags kyi khyad par khong du chud pa'i phyir ma khyad par ma lus pa nges par mngon sum dan ldan pa nyid ces brjod pa na ji ltar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni rjes su dpog pa dang / rtags kyi khyad par khong du chud pa'i phyir ma khyad par ma lus pa nges par mngon sum dan ldan pa nyid ces brjod pa na ji ltar bya ba'o //
translated: The yogi, having understood the inference and the characteristics of the reason, is said to have direct perception of all the particulars.

original: bu la sogs pa'i don 'byung pa'i don 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang ldan par rnal 'byor bas mthong ba /
analyzed: bu la sogs pa'i don 'byung pa'i don 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang ldan par rnal 'byor bas mthong ba /
translated: The yogi sees the time when the son and so on will arise.

original: @165b de ltar de 'byung bar 'gyur ba ston pa la sogs pa'i dus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: @165b de ltar de 'byung bar 'gyur ba ston pa la sogs pa'i dus dang ldan pa /
translated: Thus, he sees the time when the son and so on will arise.

original: de ltar ni bu la sogs pa de la gnod pa med de bu dang ldan pas mi gnod do //
analyzed: de ltar ni bu la sogs pa de la gnod pa med de bu dang ldan pas mi gnod do //
translated: In this way, the son and so on are not harmed, and the man with the son is not harmed.

original: 'on te rnal 'byor pas da ltar ba dang ldan par mthong na de yang bu dang ldan pas ma mthong ba'i phyir na ji ltar mi gnod snyam na ;
analyzed: 'on te rnal 'byor pas da ltar ba dang ldan par mthong na de yang bu dang ldan pas ma mthong ba'i phyir na ji ltar mi gnod snyam na ;
translated: But if the yogi sees the present time, and that is not seen by the man with the son, how is it not harmed?

original: dus de ldan ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dus de ldan ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The line the time endowed with that is stated.

original: da ltar ba'i rnal 'byor pa des mthong ba med do //
analyzed: da ltar ba'i rnal 'byor pa des mthong ba med do //
translated: The present yogi does not see it.

original: des na rnal 'byor pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: des na rnal 'byor pa ma yin pas /
translated: Therefore, the non-yogi

original: de ltar ma rtogs te na yang ste /
analyzed: de ltar ma rtogs te na yang ste /
translated: does not realize it in that way.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus nyid du la dmigs kyang gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nyes pa med do //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus nyid du la dmigs kyang gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nyes pa med do //
translated: Even if he observes the future time, there is no fault of the characteristic of harm.

original: de mi rung ba mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi rung ba mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not suitable, it is not observed.

original: bskal pa rnams la ni /
analyzed: bskal pa rnams la ni /
translated: As for the eons,

original: med par nges pa yod pa ma yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med par nges pa yod pa ma yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is said that there is no certainty of non-existence.

original: yang na bu la phas da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pa nyid du ma rtogs na'ang rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa la gnod pa yod ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yang na bu la phas da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pa nyid du ma rtogs na'ang rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa la gnod pa yod ba ma yin no //
translated: Or, even if the father does not realize the connection with the present time of the son, there is no harm to the yogi's consciousness.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang ldan pa'i yul la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang ldan pa'i yul la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no harm to the object possessing the future time.

original: des ni zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: By that means by the yogi.

original: bu dang ldan pa de'i bu de'i'o //
analyzed: bu dang ldan pa de'i bu de'i'o //
translated: Possessing a son means of that son.

original: de ltar ma rtogs kyang zhes bya ba ni snga ma du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma rtogs kyang zhes bya ba ni snga ma du bshad par bya'o //
translated: Even if not realized in that way, it should be explained as before.

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni ston pa la sogs pa'i dus so //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni ston pa la sogs pa'i dus so //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù refers to the time of teaching, etc.

original: ma rtogs na zhes bu dang lnga pas zhes bya ba skabs yin no //
analyzed: ma rtogs na zhes bu dang lnga pas zhes bya ba skabs yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf not realized‚Äù is the context of the fifth line.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba khong nas phyung la ma rtogs pa des na gnod par 'gyur ro zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba khong nas phyung la ma rtogs pa des na gnod par 'gyur ro zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù should be connected with ‚Äúnot realized,‚Äù and ‚Äúharm‚Äù should be connected with ‚Äúby that.‚Äù

original: 'on te ji ltar bya ba la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus ston pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'on te ji ltar bya ba la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus ston pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba nyid du'o //
translated: Or, it is the time of arising in the way of acting, which is connected with teaching, etc.

original: des zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas so ;
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas so ;
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù refers to the yogi.

original: ; de zhes bya ba ni bu la sogs pa'i dngos po'i //
analyzed: ; de zhes bya ba ni bu la sogs pa'i dngos po'i //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the entity of the son, etc.

original: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni bu dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni bu dang ldan pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another‚Äù refers to one who possesses a son.

original: de zhes bya ba ni bu'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the son.

original: de ma mthong bas ni rnal 'byor las gzhan gyis ma rtogs pas so //
analyzed: de ma mthong bas ni rnal 'byor las gzhan gyis ma rtogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot seeing that‚Äù refers to not realizing by another, i.e., by one other than the yogi.

original: gal te yang thag ring po na gnas pa ma yin pas chung ngu dang ches shin du chung ngu la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i dngos po rtogs pa de lta na yang ring po na gnas pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang thag ring po na gnas pa ma yin pas chung ngu dang ches shin du chung ngu la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i dngos po rtogs pa de lta na yang ring po na gnas pas ni ma yin te /
translated: But one does not perceive a thing that is distant, because it is not suitable to be near.

original: rung ba nye ba nyid med ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pas lan brjod pa ni ji ltar zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rung ba nye ba nyid med ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pas lan brjod pa ni ji ltar zhes bya'o //
translated: The response is stated in the words, ‚ÄúHow is it that . . . ?‚Äù

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni ring por gnas pa yang ngo //üîΩmthong ngam ci ste ma yin pa @166a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni ring por gnas pa yang ngo // mthong ngam ci ste ma yin pa @166a * //
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù refers to a thing that is distant.üîΩ‚ÄúIs seen‚Äù means ‚Äúis perceived.‚Äù

original: nyid do // yang na gcig gis mthong ba gzhan gyis mthong ngo zhes nges pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyid do // yang na gcig gis mthong ba gzhan gyis mthong ngo zhes nges pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, ‚ÄúHow is it that . . . ?‚Äù means ‚Äúit is not certain that one sees what another sees.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni rgod la sogs pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni rgod la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù refers to a crow, etc.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni thag ring po na gnas pa bya rog la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni thag ring po na gnas pa bya rog la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù refers to a thing that is distant.

original: de bzhin du ji ltar rnal 'byor pas mthong pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa las gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du ji ltar rnal 'byor pas mthong pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa las gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: So too, it is not seen by anyone other than the yogi who sees it in that way.

original: gal te ji ltar rnal 'byor ba la 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus dang ldan pa'i bu yod pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa las gzhan pa la yang ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar rnal 'byor ba la 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus dang ldan pa'i bu yod pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa las gzhan pa la yang ma yin nam /
translated: If the yogi sees the son who exists in the past and so on, why is it not seen by anyone other than the yogi?

original: des na ci ltar de las gzhan gyis mthong snyam na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar de las gzhan gyis mthong snyam na /
translated: How is it seen by someone other than the yogi?

original: phra mo la sogs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: phra mo la sogs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: The yogi sees it because of his subtle eye and so on.

original: chung ba dang ches shin tu chung ba la sogs pa yod par khyad par med kyang thams cad kyis ni mi mthong gi 'on kyang grog mo la sogs 'ga' zhig kho nas yin no //
analyzed: chung ba dang ches shin tu chung ba la sogs pa yod par khyad par med kyang thams cad kyis ni mi mthong gi 'on kyang grog mo la sogs 'ga' zhig kho nas yin no //
translated: Although there is no difference in the existence of the small, the very small and so on, all do not see it but some, such as ants, do.

original: ci'i phyir thams cad kyis mi mthong snyam na /üîΩgang la gcig gis zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir thams cad kyis mi mthong snyam na /üîΩgang la gcig gis zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why is it not seen by all?üîΩBecause it is seen by one who has a special eye.

original: shes bya gang la gcig gis shes par nus pa yod pa'i shes bya de la gzhan la yang shes pa'i nus pa de nyid yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes bya gang la gcig gis shes par nus pa yod pa'i shes bya de la gzhan la yang shes pa'i nus pa de nyid yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That object of knowledge in regard to which one is able to know by means of one, in regard to that object of knowledge, the capacity for knowledge does not exist for another.

original: des na rnal 'byor pa ni dbang po gsal ba'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag par bya pa nyid kyis nye ba yin pa'i phyir mthong ba yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na rnal 'byor pa ni dbang po gsal ba'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag par bya pa nyid kyis nye ba yin pa'i phyir mthong ba yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the yogi is the seer, because of the clarity of the sense faculty and because of the proximity of the object of inference.

original: 'o na de ji ltar ma 'ongs pa yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na de ji ltar ma 'ongs pa yin snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúHow is it that it is future?‚Äù

original: rnal 'byor min pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor min pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: [The root text] says, ‚Äúnot by the non-yogi.‚Äù

original: gal te tshul 'di dang rnam pa gzhan gyis dbang po 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gnas pa'i / bstan zi na pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te tshul 'di dang rnam pa gzhan gyis dbang po 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gnas pa'i / bstan zi na pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: If it is not just the present that is the object of the sense faculty that is situated in the past, etc., in this way and in other ways,

original: des na ci'i don du rnam pa gzhan nye bar mtshon par byed pa nyid du 'di nyid du 'di nye bar bkod ce na /
analyzed: des na ci'i don du rnam pa gzhan nye bar mtshon par byed pa nyid du 'di nyid du 'di nye bar bkod ce na /
translated: then for what purpose is this very [present] set forth here as the very representation of another aspect?

original: log par rtog pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba kho na nyid du bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: log par rtog pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba kho na nyid du bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe object of mistaken conception‚Äù is for the purpose of teaching that it is only the present.

original: log par rtog pa de nyid ston pa'i don du dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: log par rtog pa de nyid ston pa'i don du dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate that very misconception, he anticipates an objection:

original: 'on te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: But if it is said, etc.

analyzed: rjes su dpag pa des zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: 'das pa'i rgyus bskyed pa'i 'bras bu 'das par 'gyur ram ci snyam du dogs na rjes su dpag pa de bskyed pa'i mngon sum nyid ces smras so //

original: ji ltar mngon sum gyi mthong ba rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa de bzhin du rjes su dpag pas mthong ba yang mngon sum gyis yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum gyi mthong ba rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa de bzhin du rjes su dpag pas mthong ba yang mngon sum gyis yin no //
translated: Just as what is seen by direct perception is understood by inference, so what is seen by inference is by direct perception.

original: rgyu dag 'bras bu dag gi tshul ni de ltar ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dag 'bras bu dag gi tshul ni de ltar ma yin no //
translated: But the relation between causes and effects is not like that.

translated: Therefore, ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the conclusion of his own position.

original: gal te mngon sum rjes su dpag pas bskyed pa nyid ni /

original: rnam grangs kyis 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyis 'jug par 'gyur ro //

original: des na cig car dngos po du ma 'dzin par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na cig car dngos po du ma 'dzin par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, it is not that there is a simultaneous apprehension of many things.üîΩTherefore, there is no possibility of omniscience.

original: des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa ni /

original: sgra don rnam par du ma'i bdag nyid can bstan bcos kyi rnam par rtog pa bzhin du rim ma yin par snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni de shin tu goms pa las bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra don rnam par du ma'i bdag nyid can bstan bcos kyi rnam par rtog pa bzhin du rim ma yin par snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni de shin tu goms pa las bya ba'o //

original: dper na goms pa phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i du ba las me rtogs pa ni phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i rim pa la ltos pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'das pa la sogs pa'i don rjes su dpog pa yang gcig kho na'iüîΩchos don mtha' dag 'dzin @167b bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na goms pa phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i du ba las me rtogs pa ni phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i rim pa la ltos pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'das pa la sogs pa'i don rjes su dpog pa yang gcig kho na'i chos don mtha' dag 'dzin @167b bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the inference of the meaning of the past and so on is also just one.

analyzed: des na nges bskyed ba'i mngon sum yang gcig gi tshe kho na mtha' med pa'i don 'dzin pa'i phyir na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid srid pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the direct perception that produces ascertainment also apprehends the infinite meaning at just one time, and so omniscience is possible.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas so //

analyzed: de ste de rtogs na dngos po thog ma dang tha ma med pa ji ltar yin zhes sun 'byin pa brjod pa ni /

analyzed: des na rig byed kyi brjod pa 'ga' yang rjes su bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
